name: Just Find It 2
description:
In Just Find It 2, prepare to be immersed in a thought-provoking collection of new games!



Find all the differences, make matches, play memory games, and challenging puzzles for unexpected surprises that will keep you engaged throughout your adventure.

Features

  • Search for bonus collectibles and extra hidden object challenges!
  • Make matches, find details, memory, montage, and swap tiles, too!
  • Play through the game in any order you want!

Collector's Edition

  • 24 extra bonus levels!
  • Wallpapers and soundtrack also included!

Play 7 kinds of games and brace yourself for an unforgettable experience!
